title: Spotify is about to cram more features into its main app, this time for live audio
content:
Spotify is supposedly moving its live audio app, Greenroom, to its main app in an effort to increase its visibility. Greenroom launched last year and is going to be rebranded as Spotify Live. Similar to Clubhouse, this will be a place where creators can have live conversations with their subscribers as their audience. 

more…

The post Spotify is about to cram more features into its main app, this time for live audio appeared first on 9to5Mac.
